description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d10 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} uses one of the following breath weapons.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} exhales &Reference[fire]{fire} in a 15-foot &Reference[cone]{cone}. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save dex 13 format=long]], taking [[/damage 4d10 type=fire average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} exhales gas in a 15-foot &Reference[cone]{cone}. Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save str 13 format=long]] or have disadvantage on Strength-based attack rolls, &Reference[str]{Strength} checks, and &Reference[str]{Strength} saving throws for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Amphibious. The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} can breathe air and water.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
